column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because of their take out practices.  While I definitely enjoy dining in the restaurant
column2: sometimes you're not feeling like going out
column3: and you really want to pick up some ramen from your favorite ramen place and eat it at home on your couch in front of netflix.  I tried this one night
column4: and when I got home and opened my container of Spicy Chicken Ramen (my favorite)
column5: I found that it not only contained much less broth/noodles than a bowl served in the restaurant typically would
column6: but that the entire order had one small piece of chicken in it.   While I'm sure this was an unfortunate oversight
column7: I wish their take out game was on the same par as their table service.  Otherwise
